Posts.EditableText: The 2018 Spring Thing Festival of Interactive Fiction is now open at springthing.net/2018 with 20 games in a wide range of styles and systems. Games from textadventures.co.uk authors (let me know if I've missed anyone): "Zeppelin Adventure" by me http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/4xh4dszkrkyrlsfgwzcmyw/zeppelin-adventure "Drumsticks" by NecroDeath http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/u1qqebkep0swygqchly8ca/drumsticks "Guttersnipe: The Baleful Backwash" by bitterkarella http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/b7rabo0jiu6gwj6oyxiqjq/guttersnipe-the-baleful-backwash You can browse the games, and make nominations for prize ribbons, at the Spring Thing site. Share and Enjoy!
Posts.HTML:
The 2018 Spring Thing Festival of Interactive Fiction is now open at springthing.net/2018 with 20 games in a wide range of styles and systems.

Games from textadventures.co.uk authors (let me know if I've missed anyone):
"Zeppelin Adventure" by me http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/4xh4dszkrkyrlsfgwzcmyw/zeppelin-adventure
"Drumsticks" by NecroDeath http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/u1qqebkep0swygqchly8ca/drumsticks
"Guttersnipe: The Baleful Backwash" by bitterkarella http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/b7rabo0jiu6gwj6oyxiqjq/guttersnipe-the-baleful-backwash

You can browse the games, and make nominations for prize ribbons, at the Spring Thing site.

Share and Enjoy!

Posts.EditableText: Sounds good.  I will definitely check it out.  Perhaps, if I stop jacking around, I might throw a game in next year!  Good luck to you Questers!
Posts.HTML: Sounds good. I will definitely check it out. Perhaps, if I stop jacking around, I might throw a game in next year! Good luck to you Questers!

Posts.EditableText:
To nominate a game, follow this link (after playing at least two games, of course):

http://springthing.net/2018/nominate.html
